StartingTimeOfDoses: After birth/ If not possible with Penta 1

SideEffects: Mild swelling at the injection site
Small red bump at the site
Precautions: Not recommended for individuals with a compromised immune system
Consult with a healthcare professional if there are concerns
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: BCG is also used as a treatment for bladder cancer.

DiseaseName: Diphtheria, Pertussis, Tetanus, Hepatitis B, Haemophilus Influenza B

SideEffects: Mild pain at the injection site
Precautions: Not recommended for individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions to any component of the vaccine
Consult with a healthcare professional if there are concerns
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: This vaccine protects against multiple diseases in a single shot.

SideEffects: Pain or swelling at the injection site
Precautions: Not recommended for individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions to any component of the vaccine
Consult with a healthcare professional if there are concerns
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: This vaccine provides protection against pneumococcal diseases.

WhenShouldYouGetIN: At birth (0 dose), and at 6, 10, and 14 weeks of age

Precautions: Individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions to a previous dose should not receive further doses
Consult with a healthcare professional if there are concerns
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: OPV is a crucial vaccine for the global eradication of polio.

SideEffects: Mild redness or swelling at the injection site
Precautions: Individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions to a previous dose should consult with a healthcare professional
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: MR vaccine provides protection against measles and rubella.

SideEffects: Mild redness or swelling at the injection site
Precautions: Individuals with a history of severe allergic reactions to a previous dose should consult with a healthcare professional
AdditionalInformation.OtherNotes: Measles vaccine provides protection against measles.
